message.content:
cs.CV, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.RO, cs.MM 

This paper proposes a model for action segmentation using spatiotemporal CNNs, which is a common approach in computer vision (cs.CV). The model also uses a semi-Markov model for transitions between actions, which involves probabilistic modeling and inference (cs.AI). The paper also introduces an efficient constrained segmental inference algorithm, which is a methodological contribution that could be relevant to machine learning (cs.LG) and robotics (cs.RO). Finally, the proposed model is evaluated on cooking and surgical action datasets, which are examples of multimedia applications (cs.MM).
